name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Lawyer Yi Shenghua said that his Weibo post exposing funeral homes in many places reselling corpses is no longer visible

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens contributed their own Bangladesh student protest mashup video to pay tribute to the heroic Bangladeshi people

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, all topics related to "Thousands of bodies in Taiyuan, Shanxi being resold as materials" have been banned on all platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Sina News, the manipulator behind the scenes, Li Baoxing, was the actual person in charge and directed all illegal activities. He was once awarded the title of "National Model Worker"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the domestic news related to "stealing corpses" has begun to "surround the United States to save Zhao"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of August 9, a container on a cargo ship exploded in the Beilun Port area of Ningbo, Zhejiang, Zhoushan Port. A mushroom cloud rose at the scene. According to reports, no casualties were reported so far.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 8 (Released) Beijing. A woman posted a video to report her husband (Zhang Jixing, the detective of the Economic Investigation Brigade of the Chaoyang Branch of the Beijing Public Security Bureau) for abusing his power to accept huge bribes, committing long-term domestic violence, and keeping a mistress.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 9, Yan'an, Shaanxi. After heavy rain, cars piled up and were washed away in Zhidan County. Many cars were soaked in water and covered with mud.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Huzhou City, Zhejiang Province, a man stabbed himself several times on the street, and the police worked together to subdue him on the spot.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of August 8, the lawyer who exposed the theft and resale of corpses spoke out, revealing that many media outlets contacted him that day, including reporters from AFP and the Wall Street Journal. He said he would not accept interviews from foreign media, only central media. "My goal is to promote supervision and legislation. I don't want to die without a complete body in the future."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 8, a magnitude 7.1 earthquake occurred near Kyushu Island, Japan, and netizens inside the Great Firewall left messages expressing gloating.
